thread.title: Melania Trump May NEVER Move Into The White House With Her Husband!
thread.title_full: Melania Trump May NEVER Move Into The White House With Her Husband! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: Melania Trump May NEVER Move Into The White House With Her Husband!
text:
Melania Trump may not move into the White House after all… and considering we've only actually seen her on election day and at the inauguration, we wouldn't be too surprised if she didn't!
We know she's focusing on raising Donald Trump 's 10-year-old son, Barron , but we're sure holing up in the $100 million triplex Trump Tower apartment in NYC isn't too shabby.
We'd want to keep a distance, too!
Related: Melania Moving Forward With Defamation Lawsuit 
Though it was originally said the first lady would pack her bags and head to Washington D.C. after this school year ends, it sounds like that's still very much up in the air.
A family insider tells Us Weekly : 
"They will reevaluate toward the end of the school year if they will keep this arrangement or if Melania and Barron will move to Washington. They could go either way right now. They will ultimately do what's best for Barron."
This is certainly an unprecedented move for our country's first couple, but when everything else is so messed up, we'll pick our battles.
When ABC News ' David Muir recently asked Drumpf if he felt lonely in 1600 Pennsylvania Ave without his bride and youngest son, POTUS said:
"No, because I end up working longer. And that's OK."
"Working"… great…
(We think this is an appropriate opportunity to say once again… Barry , come back!!!)
Related: Vanity Fair Mexico Should Be Ashamed Of Themselves! 
Although Melania is living separately, another source tells the outlet she's still "embracing the role and responsibilities of first lady":
"Melania is actively building her team, including hiring a chief of staff, a senior adviser and a social secretary, among other key positions. While she is a mom first, she is very much embracing the role and responsibilities of first lady."
Sorry, Ivanks !
Tags: barack obama , donald trump , family , ivanka trump , love line , melania trump , politik
